title: Soundbites: Draftees weigh in on their new teams - VT hokiesports.com
content: Soundbites: Draftees weigh in on their new teams  VT hokiesports.com
description: Following the conclusion of the 2022 NFL Draft, Virginia Tech football's four players that were drafted held press conferences with their local teams' media and addressed their excitement on what's to come at the next level.
